Field.Name: AppImageURL1
Field.Description: An image or screenshot for this app. Images should have a width of 512 pixels and a height of 384 pixels.

Field.Name: AppImageURL3
Field.Description: An image or screenshot for this app. Images should have a width of 512 pixels and a height of 384 pixels.

Field.Description: An image or screenshot for this app. Images should have a width of 512 pixels and a height of 384 pixels.

Field.Description: An image or screenshot for this app. Images should have a width of 512 pixels and a height of 384 pixels.

Field.Name: AppImageURL5
Field.Description: An image or screenshot for this app. Images should have a width of 512 pixels and a height of 384 pixels.

Field.Name: AppThumbnailURL
Field.Description: The URL to the app icon. The icon should have a width and height of 96 pixels.

Field.Name: IsFeaturedApp
Field.Description: This app should appear in the "noteworthy" section.

Field.Name: ClientComponentDeveloperTermsOfUseUrl
Field.DisplayName: Component Developer Terms of Use Url

Field.Name: IsAppPackageEnabled
Field.Description: End users should see this app as an option to add to sites.

Field.Name: AppVideoURL
Field.Description: A URL to a video file or web page with an embedded video

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Apps for SharePoint
pnp:ListInstance.Description: A catalog to store apps for SharePoint

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Form Templates
pnp:ListInstance.Description: This library contains administrator-approved form templates that were activated to this site collection.

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Leave Requests
pnp:ListInstance.ValidationMessage: Leave Start date can not be after End date

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Site Assets
pnp:ListInstance.Description: Use this library to store files which are included on pages within this site, such as images on Wiki pages.

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Style Library
pnp:ListInstance.Description: Use the style library to store style sheets, such as CSS or XSL files. The style sheets in this gallery can be used by this site or any of its subsites.
